item.title: Are we killing the planet in style | Sustainable Fashion
item.author: Felix Editor,Eloise Hunt,
item.description: At the thought of pollution, we imagine raw sewage pumped into rivers, open-caste mines and oil spills. We don’t often think of our fluffy unicorn slippers or plaid shirts.
